Work Sans

Work Sans font family

  • Designer: Unknown
  • License: Unknown
  • Version: Unknown
  • Character Sets: Latin Extended support

Font Specimen

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

Regular: Typography matters for readability
Bold: Typography matters for readability

Quick Integration

CSS

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Work Sans';
  src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.5.0/Work-Sans/fonts/webfonts/Work Sans-400.woff2') format('woff2');
  font-weight: 400;
  font-style: normal;
  font-display: swap;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Work Sans', system-ui, sans-serif;
}

HTML with preload

<link rel="preload" 
      href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.5.0/Work-Sans/fonts/webfonts/Work Sans-400.woff2" 
      as="font" 
      type="font/woff2" 
      crossorigin>
